item.name: Arrow
entries: These projectiles are the ammunition for {@group bow|PC1|bows}. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

item.name: Sling Bullets
entries: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in {@item sling|PC1|slings}.

item.name: Bolt
entries: Shorter than traditional {@item arrow|PC1|arrows} but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by {@group crossbow|PC1|crossbows}.

item.name: Blowgun Dart
entries: These thin, light darts are typically made of hardwood and stabilized with fletching of down or fur. They are often hollow so they can be used to deliver poison.
Ordinary clothing is functional with basic tailoring, such as peasant garb, monk's robes, or work clothes.

Explorer’s clothing is sturdy enough that it can be reinforced to protect you, even though it isn’t a suit of armor. It comes in many forms, though the most common resemble clerical vestments, monk’s garments, or wizard’s robes, as members of these classes likely avoid wearing armor.
